scripts.build: sh -c "if [ -d .git ]; then git fetch --unshallow --tags || git fetch --tags; fi" && node scripts/bump-build.js && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('node_modules/vite')){console.log('Installing deps via npm ci...'); require('child_process').execSync('npm ci --include=dev', {stdio:'inherit'});} " && npm run build:app
